Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: [23][24][25] Planar dithieno[3,2-b:2′,3′-d]pyrrole ( DTP ) , with good π-conjugation , showed great potential for use in organic electronic materials.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| planar dithieno[3,2-b:2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP) |
| organic electronic materials |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "planar dithieno[3,2-b:2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP)" and "organic electronic materials". These entities are mentioned as having potential for use in electronic applications and as a category of materials, respectively.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| planar dithieno[3,2-b:2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP) |

In this revised paragraph, the only clear "Material Name" entity is "planar dithieno[3,2-b:2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP)". The other entity, "organic electronic materials", is a category of materials and not a specific material, so it does not meet the criteria for a "Material Name" entity.
